args: *pant* *pant* Hey, Sha Wujing...\nIs it always so bright here...?
I do not recall hearing of sunlight being\nparticularly strong in this area, no.
Then why is it so damn hot?!
It's been like this for days!\nThe damn thing even shines at night.
The answer is obvious: We are\nexperiencing a convulsion of nature.
Yeah, I'm aware of that—what I\ndon't get is why it's HAPPENING.
None are so cursed as the man who\nlacks imagination. ...Ahem! If I may?

When extraordinary natural phenomena
occur in regions with otherwise stable
climates, it cannot be mere chaos.
There is always a reason behind it.
In such a case, one begins to look\nfor external factors and causes.
Now then! What objects do we know of\nthat cause such unpleasant gyrations\nin the natural order of things, hmmMMM?
Relics, my friend! Sweet, sweet relics!
I should have known this conversation\nwould lead us back to those damn things.\nYou're obsessed. You know that, right?
Perhaps. Ah, but there is something else\nat the pulsating heart of my search.\nFor you see, where there are relics...

There is also dear Master Xuan Zang,
the benefactor for whom we have
been searching lo these many years!
Find the relics, and we find HER!
I hate it when you make sense.\nBut all right—let's get to lookin'!
...So now all the villagers have\nstarted to abandon the land.
The old folks are all sick, and we kids\ndon't know enough about farming yet\nto make sure the crops come in.
Papa collapsed yesterday. And Mama...\nMama, she... *sniff*
Hey, come on. No crying, okay?\nWe'll figure something out.
But Sis, we can't even pay\nfor mom's medicine!
You have all suffered greatly,\nbut please set your minds at ease.
Take this dagger—it is a weapon of\nsuperior quality from a place named\nTaiwu located far to the east.
Sell it for a fair price, then use the\nmoney for your mother's care.
Oh, no! We could never do that!
Do it. For your mother's sake,\nas well as your siblings.
By the time the medicine runs out,\nthis natural disaster should be calmed.
Heaven would never abandon kind children\nwho think so much of their elders.
(I believe I know what is behind these\nabnormalities, and I WILL see it repaired!)
It has been so very long, but your loving\nand faithful servants are ready to attend\nto your every need once more!
Zhu Bajie? Sha Wujing? I haven't seen\nyou in YEARS. ...Er, please tell me you\nwere not searching for me the entire time.
Of course we were! But to the point,\nwe believe a relic to be responsible\nfor this recent convulsion of nature.
You are correct. The abnormalities in this\nregion are caused by the destabilization\nof a certain long-slumbering relic.
This legendary relic is known as the Xihe,\nand it holds power over the chi of light.
Must be a pretty fancy relic if it's\nthreatening an entire region.
It has free reign over the chi of light—\none could even say it functions as a\nsecond sun.
What power... What utter menace...\nAaaah! My skin wriggles with delight!
I see you are as you always have been,\nSha Wujing. But we have greater concerns\nwith the Xihe than mere curiosity.
If we make but a single misstep in this\nmatter, it could result in the loss not\nonly of our lives, but the entire region.
Sounds like the sooner you seal this thing,\nthe better it'll be for everyone.
Alas, the Xihe cannot be sealed.

Allow me to explain: I would indeed be
capable of sealing the Xihe if I were to
bend my entire will to the matter.
That is not the issue here.
The issue is that the Xihe\nSHOULD not be sealed.
Ooooo, that is SO fascinating!\nPlease tell us more!
Originally, this land was barren and fallow,\nbecause it was lacking in the chi of light.
In order to speed development of the land,\nthe Qilin made the Xihe and left it here.
The Xihe has been preserving the balance\nof chi in this place for centuries now.\nIf we seal it, that balance will collapse.
This land will return to a barren waste,\nand its people will face a new, equally\nunpleasant type of hardship.

So we must deal with the Xihe because
it is creating a convulsion in nature,
but doing so could create a new problem
of equal destructive power.
HmmmMMMM! This is quite\nthe sticky situation indeed.
Yes, these are peculiar circumstances.\nBut as a sealer, it is my duty to find\na solution.
Um, I'm gonna go home now.\nThanks again, nice lady!
Come find me again if you need anything.
I fear for the lives of these people if the\nland returns to an infertile state.
If it becomes an inhospitable place,\nit will extinguish all life along with it.
So then! What's a sealer to do with\na relic that doesn't wanna be sealed?
First, I must speak with someone\nwho may have a solution.
Then I will find a way to save this land.
Are you this dedicated to helping every\nrandom area that's in trouble?
If the ancient Qilin abused it for their\nown convenience, then yes.

The people that came to live here are but
innocent victims, and I will not permit the
whims of the Qilin to once again steal
away their very livelihoods.
By my duty as a sealer, I will protect\nthe people in this region!
